dict.acceptation: 清楚的，明白的；清晰的，明亮的；清澈的；明确的；
扫除，除去；消除（嫌疑）；使清楚；使干净；

sent.orig: For compressible fluid flow, the convergence characteristics of CLEAR are closely related to the Ma number.
sent.trans: 对可压缩流动，CLEAR算法的收敛性能与Ma数密切相关。

sent.orig: The clear property sets the sides of an element where other floating elements are not allowed.
sent.trans: 使用clear属性可以让元素边上不出现其它浮动元素。

sent.orig: The clear operations put the condition back in its valid state.
sent.trans: clear操作将条件重设为有效状态。

sent.orig: A dog is defined as Clear if it has no bad CEA genes.
sent.trans: 当一只犬没有不好的CEA因子时可以定义为洁净者(Clear)。

sent.orig: The clear and setstate operations change the state of the condition member.
sent.trans: clear和setstate操作用于改变条件成员的状态。
